TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EmptyConstraint extends NUnit.Framework.Constraints.Constraint

Docs.summary: EmptyConstraint tests a whether a string or collection is empty, postponing the decision about which test is applied until the type of the actual argument is known.
